attributes.name: pageOptions
attributes.description: Configuration object used to configure paging behavior. pageName is used to denote the key used for the paging index, pageSize is used to denote the width or lenght of a page, url, query and body are all booleans used to determine how the paging data should be passed to the ajax call, and pageType is either 'index' or 'offset' depending on if the page is calculated from an index and count or is a single record offset value.
